Key Match Events: The Pacers started a 17-2 run in the second quarter turning a deficit into a lead
Key moments included back-to-back 3-pointers by Haliburton and Mathurin
Pacers had a 54-46 scoring advantage inside the paint
Post-Match Reflections: Coach Kerr noted the Warriors' effort despite missing key players
Pacers' momentum and depth were highlighted
Miscellaneous Highlights: Golden State was short-handed with multiple key players resting
Pat Spencer scored a season high 17 points
